Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: I was in town after meeting with sellers wanting to Lu their home on the market. While waiting for my next appointment, I stopped by to have lunch at Cafe Chris. Restaurant was packed but wait staff managed to greet and I thought it was ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Service was pleasant and efficient.  Food was good.  Very busy at lunch time.  Hamburger steak hubby ordered was right up there with the best he's had.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Today was my first time visiting and it will NOT be my last! I can‚Äôt believe how authentically flavorful this cooking is. Literally, just like grandma makes. Delicious and worth every penny. Service is fast and attentive. Food is delicious and huge portions should be expected.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: The staff was very pleasant and my chicken fried steak was very delicious. I also give them an A+ for hearty portions.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Very popular spot with the local crowd. Service can be a bit slow at times when crowded, but it's worth the wait. Awesome homemade fries and tasty catfish are among the nicely varied menu items.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: I have been a couple of times and I had the chicken fried chicken witch I had to share both times my daughter and son in law had the chicken fried steak and had to share it also. Great food and great service.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great food and the staff is AWESOME. They added some very üòé merch! I had to have the red!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Super friendly staff!  Seated very quickly. Came in for a late dinner and was very pleased with service and portion size.  I ordered the chicken fried steak with fries and a side of fruit.  The prices are very reasonable.   My daughter ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: This was a really awesome place to go for lunch! We had the their chicken fried steak and it was soooooo good. The steak was huge! And hand breaded with the perfect breading yum yum!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Their food is always delicious and their service is excellent.  Everyone is helpful and friendly (always smiling)! Love them! ‚ù§

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Absolutely delicious food prompt and friendly service and very spacious!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great food and great staff I recommend the chicken fried steak

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: One of my absolute favorite spots for lunch. It is healthy, you get a very appealing amount, and they are consistent in phemonal customer service. My choice every time!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Love this place, awsome food always!!! This salad is loved by someone named Bridget.   It has the chicken strips added. YUM!!!!!!!!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great food. Nice proprietor. Always my favorite place to go in town.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Fast service and delicious  food.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: The small catfish plate was tasty and well prepared. Service was excellent.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: First time there, the waitresses were extremely nice. Will go back soon.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Had their burger, my family had their shrimp and their enchiladas. It was all pretty good. Just good down home food. Service was a bit slower tonight, but with staffing shortages and it being dinner time, I can understand.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Deliciously huge chicken fried steaks! The salads are crisp and fresh. The tea was awesome and Irma is amazing at what she does. And the atmosphere is very warm and welcoming. The prices are very reasonable, well worth it. I highly recommend giving this place a try, you will be satisfied.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Mary, Erica and the whole staff are incredible!! So wonderful to be able to dine-in and enjoy that amazing food. Their dedication to serving us during the times of the pandemic did not go unnoticed. We are immensely appreciative.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: My country fried steak was ok (sorry guy's). The service was great, YES SIR and YES MA'AM, DAMN I love southern hospitality. Cute little place, I'll give it a 2nd chance next time I'm back.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great little hole in the wall gem. Awesome variety on the menu, everyone was very friendly and attentive. The food was great all 4 of our meals were tasty.  Only 1 had to go back as the waitress hadn't paid attention to the multiple times ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: This place is the classic country diner! Great food, excellent service from the wait staff,  and affordable.  With the train motif and memorabilia definitely kid friendly and a great place for the family.  If you are looking for that down home go-to place, head over to Cafe Chris.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Nice local Cafe. Sweet tea is fresh!  Fried catfish plate is a favorite.  Friendly service!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Love it here! It's always packed with happy customers and the staff is always super friendly! The food is SO good too as soon as I leave I'm ready to go back. Lots of stuff to choose from on the menu, I like to try new things and have never been disappointed. My husband, though, he always goes for that chicken fried steak! üëç

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Excellent food. What ever you choose, either TexMex or Americana their quality of food is consistent and flavorful. If your asking me you can't go wrong with the chicken fried steak. Always a pleasure eating here.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text:
Fast deliver food cold good service
I like everything not fry fruit or salad

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Good food and even better service. Busy but no real wait time for food. Would 5 star but you have to pay for refills of u drink cokes. Highly recommend.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: First time eating here, everything was great. From the servers to the food. Only complaint is why hadn't my husband and I stopped by and tried them out.  We will definitely be back. Great food and great people..also kuddos to the kitchen chefs,  y'all rock...

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text:
Super friendly staff, pretty good food great portions.
I'll be back for sure.
I had the small catfish plate with veggies and fruit.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Very good. Always busy there, but good service.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Always have a good experience here, I've had the chicken fried steak, taco salad, crispy taco. Good american plates here. You may want to order the onion rings !!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: We had chicken salad sandwiches with chips. We got them to go. The chicken salad was tasty with the right amount of mayonnaise. The lettuce was crispy. The wheat bread was fresh and held up very well with the chicken salad,not the least bit ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Nice small town feel! Good service and great food!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Caf√© Chris was awesome. Best handbreaded chicken fried steak we've had in a long time . The service was great as well fast , friendly and courtious waitresses.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: I first learned of this place via a Facebook post (from a friend).  I'd give a 4.5 if possible.  Our only "complaint" was that there was a bit too much breading; otherwise, the food was awesome!  The short trip down from San Antonio was well worth it!!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Today was my first visit, I had the Italiano Salad. It was awesome. Everything on the menu sounded great and all the served plates around me looked really really good! I will be back. probably tomorrow!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great place to eat! Awsome service!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Cafe Chris has excellent staff and food as well.  My wife and I frequent this restaurant for lunch.  We have the chicken salad plate and chef salad plate.  The portion is large and very very fresh.  I recommend this place above most every other place in town.  Keep up the great work!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Generic.  That's the impression I was left with here. VERY friendly staff though.  I'm referring to the food.  I had the chicken fried steak.  Needed salt IMO, but I understand not over salting a dish to be able to serve to a wider ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Wonderful meal served by wonderful people.   Hard working staff who care.  Clean restroom, clean kitchen and tables are clean.   Good food, well worth the time to stop in.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Best chicken fried Steak  and Salad in town

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Our first time there. We ordered to go and the food was very good. Served hot which we really enjoyed. Prices are good and the  lady at the pickup window was very friendly and courteous. We recommend it. We will be back.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Excellent Food & Excellent Service! 1st time but DEFINITELY NOT LAST TIME! Can't wait to go again being from out of town good HOMECOOKING ALWAYS HITS THE SPOTüòÅ

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Country cookin' Texas size with all the trimmins for hungry buckaroos and buckarettes. Split the chicken fried steak unless you risk splittin' yer britches.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great food and service. Burger was amazing! Everything is always great!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: One of my favorite small owned restaurants! Everyone is so sweet and welcoming, and the food is always amazing. I would highly recommend cafe Chris to everyone ‚ù£Ô∏è

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: This restaurant is not real large and it's in a shopping center however the food and service were excellent, it was very clean and had a cozy atmosphere. I enjoyed my meal there.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: This is a really good spot to stop for lunch.  I had the ham and cheese croissant, warm, and fruit on the side.  Delicious.  The place is very clean and not over crowded with too many tables.  The waitresses are very friendly.  The deserts ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Good food great customer service.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: A friend with her male friend and myself went to meet to celebrate his birthday. We ordered tortilla soup w/salad , burger meal, and fidel bowl w/salad. Birthday boy recieved a piece a carret cake. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text:
Caf√© Chris never disappoints, and they didn't this day. I ordered the ChickenüêîFried Steak Sandwich with üçü fries and I couldn't believe üëÄhow huge it was.
Friesüçüwere hot & crisp but I had to take sandwich home which I attacked when I got home... DELICIOUS!!!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Good food at good prices. Chicken fried steak is great! I only have two complaints. Wish they had mashed potatoes all the time because their mashed potatoes are really good. And wish they would put their house salad in a bowl instead of on a little saucer.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Nice place. And great service!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Friendly staff and a great menu selection and a nice cafe decor full of railroad memorabilia makes for a pleasant dining experience. We have not had anything that was not just great off the menu. The catfish is really, really good.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text:
Staff at the window was very funny and friendly
Food was great can't wait to go back. üòÅ

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: This place had a nice atmosphere, the tea was good and waitress was very nice. As for the food it was average nothing to brag about. Prices were reasonable. Chicken fried steak had alot of breading and was unseasoned.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Staff was friendly and the food was good. I had the chicken fried chicken, fries and a fruit salad. My husband had the hamburger steak, fries and side salad. The food was hot and salads nice and cold. Environment,  food and staff was all good.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great personnel and service is quick! Sanwiches--chicken salad and pimento  cheese combo is filling and awesome! Daily soups are interesting and tasty. I don't like their Mexican food, though.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: I like the fact you can order 1/2 the size of your entree

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Best chicken fried steak ever. Only problem was that my child's meal was supposed to be free and I got charged for it

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Everyone was so friendly and the food was amazing as always. I love this place.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Love this place. Get the fruit salad as a side...generous portion of two melons, pineapple, and oranges. Desserts are homemade. Try the ice cream pies. Sub sandwiches are good...where else can you get a bologna sandwich anymore? We go out of our way to eat here.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Love catfish it was on point needs just a lil cajun seasoning an coleslaw. Purple onion slices dill pickles spears add to ur plate an u would be slinging catfish everytime I come home. Nice folks.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great Gluten free menu without trading off the comfort food taste. I had Chicken Fried Steak which did use cube steak, but was way too much breading for me. This makes it look larger than it really is. I think all in all great place to eat ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: The food was good! Good size portions and friendly service!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: One of several local restaurants I like and the friendliness of the wait staff is unbeatable, but I have to confess to being a huge railroad fan and the train pictures and memorabilia always give me something to smile about.  The food is outstanding, and I keep discovering new favorites, but your onion rings are to die for!!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Food was great and service was very friendly. We had lunch and the cafe was packed which is a great sign, the downside is we were seated at a too small table right next to the drink station and trash can. Other than that, everything was great.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Had the chicken salad plate, huge portion and came with a avacado ranch dressing which was amazing. Service was great and fast. Refills came quick. Would definitely go back.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Delicious catfish platter! Quick service, homemade and great prices! Worth the trip in to Pleasanton!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great food, super service. Love this restaurant!!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great food and great service.  Every server asks if your meal is ok and if you need anything. They all work together well. I'll be back!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: It's our absolute favorite family diner, the food is great and comforting and the staff is very friendly and outgoing, down to earth, the place isn't over priced like many places are. I will highly recommend this cafe, my family & I love it.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: They serve the best chicken salad in South Texas. The service is fast and they are very friendly.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Love there home style burgers

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: The Tea and Lemonade weren't sweet at all The chicken fried steak was more crust that meat and had no taste all bland, my fruit was bitter

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great food and atmosphere. Staff is well educated on the menu and you always get that home cooked feel

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great food good people we felt right at home. A great place to eat.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great food, service. Everything is served quickly and is fresh.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: The best homemade food in town! Very very great atmosphere! The employees are awesome great attitudes positive energy. Clean bathrooms! and on top of that their tea is so tasty

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Good burgers.  Friendly staff.  Better-than-average off highway cafe.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Comfort food and the best customer service

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Cafe Chris has great food. Salads are awesome,also burgers and just about everything is good. The staff are very helpful and kind. Perfect service.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text:
English guy just passing through. Staff friendly, typical Texas country home cooking. Had the chicken fried steak. Like everything in Texas....Huge!!!
Seems like it's the best place in town. Enjoyed.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: I have been very few places where the customer service was so welcoming and kind! Would definitely recommend to anybody lunch specials are great! Fast and friendly service.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Oh my goodness this place is flipping awesome all the way around! Friendly people, great food and fast service. Ima is the one that waited on my son and I and she was very attentive but not overbearing, sign of a GREAT waitressn

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: 1st time I been in there, service was great and food came rite out. Delicious chicken salad plate. Fresh fruit galore!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: The staff always makes you feel welcome and the food is on point. Cafe Chris is good for either a light lunch or a full meal. Hearty food that's sure to stick to your ribs!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Saw our waitress clean a spot drop the towel and didn't wash her hands before filling cups with ice.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Enjoyed my recent visit. Service was excellent.food was good although salty for my liking. I suggest use less salt & let customer add if desired. Thank U

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Waitresses are always friendly and get your order with a smile ( right it's in their eyes and always in their voices, the food no matter what you order I'd so delishious

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Simple but great country/comfort food

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great tex mex / American food from hot to cold.. daily specials are great food.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Cafe Chris has been in business  for more than 20 years! The cafe is super clean, the food is great, the  staff is knowledgeable and friendly! Best of all the salads are huge!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Food and staff are awesome!  We miss going in during covid, but very grateful they have a drive thru!!

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: It was ok. Experience wasn't bad but it wasn't good either. This is a last resort kinda place. The food is mediocre. Decent prices and the tea is pretty good. I would go here again if I don't have any other options.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Excellent food, great service and reasonable prices. Love this place

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Nice variety of food to choose from, and fast service. I liked the feel of the place better before they put an opaque coating on the plate glass that lines their seating area.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: I have been craving the food here since last month cuz I no longer live in pleasanton but I'm so disappointed.  The pineapple was spoiled the apples are brown. And I'm not sure why but the avocado was brown instead of green. 8 to 9 bucks a ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Food is fresh and tasty.. Friendly service. Great atmosphere.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Oh my goodness every time I go there their food is spectacular on point all the time the staff is extremely fabulous The waitress's are always smiley The Waitresses are ready to refill your drinks and get anything else you need quite ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Chris

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great place to eat friendly atmosphere awesome food eat here often.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: You gotta get the taco salad. Simple yet delicious. I know what you're thinking, "It's just a salad." But this salad DELIVERS. I promise it'll satisfy your hunger better than any fast food burger ever could.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Great food, friendly people, low prices.

Name: Cafe Chris

Name: Cafe Chris

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Loved the place and staff was friendly, but it is not a cafe! It had sandwiches and burgers but it was mostly Mexican food,  no chicken fried steak and if it was like grandma cooked she was from Texas.

Name: Cafe Chris
Review Text: Extremely friendly staff!  Food is great and you are given plenty of it!  The place is small but it is worth going to.  Highly recommend!!!!

Name: Cafe Chris

Name: Cafe Chris

Review Text: I have visited here for years, when I'm in town visiting my family. Now that I've moved here, I get to eat here a lot more often. Food is always great, and all the people are awesome! I try something different every time, and have never been disappointed. Love this place!
